name: Buba Blocks
author: Ecuras LLC

sections.description:
Build Your Site With Gutenberg.
Create beautiful and flexible pages with Buba Blocks.
No HTML, no CSS, no JavaScript, no PHP needed!

Buba Blocks

A Collection Of Blocks For Gutenberg
“Blocks” are sections of content on a website, for example, images, videos, paragraphs, etc. Buba Blocks is a series of ‘Blocks’ of the new WordPress block editor, Gutenberg.
Buba Blocks is a WordPress plugin that allow you create custom content without any coding knowledge.
Whether you are a beginner, designer, developer or marketer, you can build beautiful pages with Buba Blocks.

  • Accordion block: display content in a fully configurable accordion
  • Button with icon block: create button with tons of styles
  • Card block: create blocks with image, text, border color
  • Section Block: you can put inside another blocks and choose styles like background image, background positions and other
  • Container Block: block for putting in section block with styles (background color, margins, paddings)
  • Slider: full-with slider with choosing animation, duration, delay
  • Slider-images: slider with choosing animation, duration, delay, count slide
  • Table of contents block
  • Map block
  • Social share block
  • Posts block
  • Hero pattern block

Buba Blocks DEMO

Read the plugin presentation on our website

Support

Before leaving a review >> Feel free to ask questions here in the support section, we reply to every question!
We also have a support page for feature requests.

Requirements

PHP 7, 7.1, 7.2, 7.3 & 7.4 recommended for better performance, WordPress 5.5+
sections.installation:
To install the plugin automatically:

  • Require Gutenberg plugin to be installed first
  • Through WordPress admin, use the menu: Plugin > Add new
  • Search for Buba Gutenberg Blocks
  • Click on install then click activate link

To install the plugin manually:

git * Download and unzip the plugin buba-blocks.zip
* Upload the /buba-blocks directory to /wp-content/plugins/
* Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.10

  • Fix: Update dependencies and update core

1.9.1

  • Fix: The plugin does not have a valid header

1.9

  • Fix: Some code fixes

1.8

  • Add: add form block
  • Add: buttons block
  • Add: add table of contents pattern
  • Add: add russian localization
  • Fix: slider block
  • Fix: slider images block
  • Fix: accordion block
  • Fix: table of contents block
  • Fix: fix section block

1.7

  • Fix: Fix errors for WordPress 5.8.1
  • Fix: titles of blocks

1.6

  • Add: Prepare blocks to WordPress 5.8
  • Add: Add width settings to button block
  • Add: Add choosing size (% or px) for Map blocks

1.5

  • Fix: Slider images
  • Fix: Slider block
  • Fix: Added the ability to change the size, text color and background color for the post grid
  • Fix: Remove strong tag in the table of contents
  • Fix: Added the ability to change the position of the icon in the button
  • Fix: Some styles fix
  • Fix: Button animation effect and editing style
  • Fix: Width inside container and section block
  • Fix: Height of the image inside the card block
  • Fix: Moved all blocks to API version 2
  • Add: New Post Masonry block
  • Add: New Post Slider block
  • Add: New Buba Blocks icons
  • Add: Custom style for the accordion block

1.4

  • Add : New Post Layouts block

1.3

  • Fix : Some styles fix
  • Fix : Fix accordion block
  • Add : New Table of Contents Block
  • Add : New Map Block
  • Add : New Social Share Block

1.2

  • Fix : Some styles fix

1.1

  • Add : New slider-images block
  • Add : 1 pattern blocks (hero block)

1.0.1

  • Fix : FILE constant (Use of undefined constant will throw an Error in a future version of PHP)
  • Fix : Fix classes for editor
  • Add : New website link

1.0.0

  • Add : Initial version

short_description: Supercharge WordPress Gutenberg editor plugin with 11 new blocks.

upgrade_notice: Update through the automatic WordPress updater, all Buba Blocks content and configuration will remain in place.
